players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I have no reason to suspect Alice at this moment, but I urge everyone to stay vigilant and share any concerns they may have."
Bob: "I agree with Alice that Charlie's behavior is worth investigating. Let's keep a close eye on him and consider his past actions as well."
Bob: "Based on Charlie's suspicious behavior and Alice's observation, I suggest we focus our investigation on him. Let's keep a close eye on him during the night."

Charlie: "I understand that there are concerns about my behavior, but I want to assure everyone that I have no ill intentions. I will continue to work with all of you to ensure the safety and well-being of our village."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
